SEARCH
Package Accounts

Interface IAdminManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
Admin
public interface IAdminManagement
Interface defining administrative management capabilities. Methods in this interface should be implemented to manage staff, branch managers, branches, and payment methods in an administrative context.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addBranch()
    Adds a new branch to the system.
    boolean
    addManager()
    Assigns a manager to a branch.
    boolean
    addStaff()
    Adds a new staff member to the system.
    boolean
    editPaymentMethod()
    Edits the payment methods available in the system.
    boolean
    editStaff()
    Edits the details of an existing staff member.
    boolean
    promoteStaff()
    Promotes a staff member to the role of branch manager.
    boolean
    removeBranch()
    Removes an existing branch from the system.
    boolean
    removeManager()
    Assigns a manager to a branch.
    boolean
    removeStaff()
    Removes an existing staff member from the system.
    boolean
    transferEmployee()
    Transfers an employee from one branch to another.

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      boolean addStaff()
      Adds a new staff member to the system.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeStaff

      boolean removeStaff()
      Removes an existing staff member from the system.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • editStaff

      boolean editStaff()
      Edits the details of an existing staff member.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member's details were successfully edited, false otherwise.

    • addManager

      boolean addManager()
      Assigns a manager to a branch.
      Returns:
      true if the manager was successfully assigned, false otherwise.

    • removeManager

      boolean removeManager()
      Assigns a manager to a branch.
      Returns:
      true if the manager was successfully assigned, false otherwise.

    • promoteStaff

      boolean promoteStaff()
      Promotes a staff member to the role of branch manager.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully promoted, false otherwise.

    • transferEmployee

      boolean transferEmployee()
      Transfers an employee from one branch to another.
      Returns:
      true if the employee was successfully transferred, false otherwise.

    • editPaymentMethod

      boolean editPaymentMethod()
      Edits the payment methods available in the system.
      Returns:
      true if the payment method was successfully edited, false otherwise.

    • addBranch

      boolean addBranch()
      Adds a new branch to the system.
      Returns:
      true if the branch was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeBranch

      boolean removeBranch()
      Removes an existing branch from the system.
      Returns:
      true if the branch was successfully removed, false otherwise.
